darkvision.name: Darkvision
darkvision.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

hellish-resistance.name: Hellish Resistance
hellish-resistance.description: You have resistance to fire damage.

infernal-legacy.name: Infernal Legacy
infernal-legacy.description: You know the thaumaturgy cantrip. Once you reach 3rd level, you can cast the hellish rebuke spell as a 2nd-level spell; you must finish a long rest in order to cast the spell again using this trait. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.
